Trade/Device Name(s): ImmunoCAP Allergen f433, Allergen component rTri a 14 LTP, Wheat
ImmunoCAP Allergen f416, Allergen component rTri a 19 Omega-5 Gliadin, Wheat
ImmunoCAP Allergen f449, Allergen component rSes i 1 Sesame seed
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ImmunoCAP Specific IgE assay system with new allergen components for wheat and sesame using fluoroenzymeimmunoassay technology
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro quantitative measurement of allergen specific IgE in human serum or plasma (EDTA or Na-Heparin) to aid in clinical diagnosis of IgE mediated allergic disorders, for use in clinical laboratories with specified Phadia instruments
